00022     std::string Tools::windowTypeToString(WindowType type)
00023     {
00024         switch (type)
00025         {
00026         case WIN_RECT:
00027             return "Rectangular";
00028         case WIN_HAMMING:
00029             return "Hamming";
00030         case WIN_HANN:
00031             return "Hann";
00032         case WIN_BLACKMAN:
00033             return "Blackman";
00034         case WIN_BARLETT:
00035             return "Barlett";
00036         case WIN_FLATTOP:
00037             return "Flat-top";
00038         }
00039         return "Unknown";
00040     }
00041 
00050     WindowType Tools::stringToWindowType(const std::string& name)
00051     {
00052         if ("Rectangular" == name)
00053         {
00054             return WIN_RECT;
00055         }
00056         else if ("Hamming" == name)
00057         {
00058             return WIN_HAMMING;
00059         }
00060         else if ("Hann" == name)
00061         {
00062             return WIN_HANN;
00063         }
00064         else if ("Blackman" == name)
00065         {
00066             return WIN_BLACKMAN;
00067         }
00068         else if ("Barlett" == name)
00069         {
00070             return WIN_BARLETT;
00071         }
00072         else if ("Flat-top" == name)
00073         {
00074             return WIN_FLATTOP;
00075         }
00076 
00077         return WIN_HAMMING;
00078     }
